4770.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage and lowers ATK 
with a high chance of stunning the enemy

4771.superDescription:
Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy, 
lowers ATK & DEF and seals Super Attack

Active Skill.Name: Minus Energy Power Ball

Greatly raises ATK temporarily, 
causes ultimate damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF by 30% for 1 turn; 
disables enemy's action once within the turn
